rules_text:
Flying
[i]Brute Strength[/i] – You may exert Deen as he attacks. If you do, he gains rampage 2 and trample until end of turn. [i](Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)[/i]
[i]Crush[/i] – Whenever Deen, Wyvern Knight of Tarrah deals combat damage to a player, destroy target artifact that player controls.
